metadata.title: Thursday, 5th December, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

parts: (a)    when the construction of a Youth Resource Centre in Kasempa District will commence; and
(b)    whether Zambia has a national school football team.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education when the 1 x 2 classroom block at Simbuu Primary School in Sikongo Parliamentary Constituency, included in the 2013 Infrastructure Development Plan, will be constructed.
